languages.text: {n}Тщательно исследовав тела каторжников, надзиратели пришли к выводу, что убиты они были не людьми — никто не знал оружия, оставляющего подобные раны. Тела были предъявлены бунтарям, и мятеж угас — все осознали, что иная сила стоит за данным убийством.{/n}

{n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тщательно исследовав тела каторжников, надзиратели пришли к выводу, что убиты они были не людьми — никто не знал оружия, оставляющего подобные раны. Тела были предъявлены бунтарям, и мятеж угас — все осознали, что иная сила стоит за данным убийством.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens have concluded that they have not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot had died down — everyone had realised that an unknown force is behind this murder.{/n}

{n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens have concluded that they have not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot had died down — everyone had realised that an unknown force is behind this murder.{/n}

{n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

{n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

{n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

languages.text: {n}看守仔细检查了那些囚犯的尸体，断定他们并不是被人类杀害的，但没人能辨认出他们究竟是被什么武器杀死的。这些尸体被展示给所有犯人，之后这场骚动便平息了下来。每个人都意识到，这无数场谋杀背后是某种未知的势力。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}看守仔细检查了那些囚犯的尸体，断定他们并不是被人类杀害的，但没人能辨认出他们究竟是被什么武器杀死的。这些尸体被展示给所有犯人，之后这场骚动便平息了下来。每个人都意识到，这无数场谋杀背后是某种未知的势力。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Inspeccionando cuidadosamente los cadáveres de los convictos, los guardias concluyeron que no habían sido asesinados por un ser humano, ya que nadie pudo identificar el arma que infligiría tales heridas. Los cuerpos fueron mostrados a los convictos, y el motín se calmó. Todo el mundo se dio cuenta de que alguna fuerza desconocida estaba detrás de estos asesinatos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Inspeccionando cuidadosamente los cadáveres de los convictos, los guardias concluyeron que no habían sido asesinados por un ser humano, ya que nadie pudo identificar el arma que infligiría tales heridas. Los cuerpos fueron mostrados a los convictos, y el motín se calmó. Todo el mundo se dio cuenta de que alguna fuerza desconocida estaba detrás de estos asesinatos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}受刑者らの遺体を入念に調べた結果、看守らは、人間によって殺されたのではないと結論づけた...そのような傷を負わせる凶器を誰一人として特定できなかったのだ。遺体が受刑者らに公開されると、暴動は収まった...すべての者が、この殺人事件の背後には未知の力が働いていることに気づいたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}受刑者らの遺体を入念に調べた結果、看守らは、人間によって殺されたのではないと結論づけた...そのような傷を負わせる凶器を誰一人として特定できなかったのだ。遺体が受刑者らに公開されると、暴動は収まった...すべての者が、この殺人事件の背後には未知の力が働いていることに気づいたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En examinant minutieusement les cadavres, les gardiens en concluent qu'ils n'ont pas été tués par un humain, personne ne pouvant identifier le type d'arme ayant infligé de telles blessures. Les corps sont montrés aux détenus et l'émeute se calme, tout le monde réalisant que ces meurtres ont forcément été commis par quelque chose d'inconnu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En examinant minutieusement les cadavres, les gardiens en concluent qu'ils n'ont pas été tués par un humain, personne ne pouvant identifier le type d'arme ayant infligé de telles blessures. Les corps sont montrés aux détenus et l'émeute se calme, tout le monde réalisant que ces meurtres ont forcément été commis par quelque chose d'inconnu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einer sorgfältigen Untersuchung der Leichen der Gefangenen sind die Wärter zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass sie nicht von einem Menschen getötet worden waren. Niemand konnte die Waffe identifizieren, die solche Wunden verursacht. Die Leichen wurden den Sträflingen gezeigt, und der Aufstand legte sich ... Allen war klar, dass irgendeine unbekannte Macht hinter diesen Morden steckte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens concluded that they had not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer sorgfältigen Untersuchung der Leichen der Gefangenen sind die Wärter zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass sie nicht von einem Menschen getötet worden waren. Niemand konnte die Waffe identifizieren, die solche Wunden verursacht. Die Leichen wurden den Sträflingen gezeigt, und der Aufstand legte sich ... Allen war klar, dass irgendeine unbekannte Macht hinter diesen Morden steckte.{/n}
